TextView.android:text: 10 points will be added for the first correct choice, 8 points will be added for the second correct choice, 6 points will be added for the third correct choice, and 4 points will be added for the fourth correct choice.
In addition, 2 points will be deducted for each wrong option, and no points will be deducted for the same wrong option. If you get it right within 2 seconds, you will get an extra 2 points.
In total, 10 points are awarded for the correct first choice, 6 points for the second correct choice, 2 points for the correct third choice, and 2 points for the correct fourth choice.
In a single game, the maximum score is 110 points, and the minimum score is -10 points.
